## CommonProperties.device property

Device properties

**Signature:**

```typescript

        readonly type?: 'mobile' | 'desktop' | 'tablet' | 'tv' | 'gaming_console' | 'bot' | 'other';

        readonly model?: string;
        readonly brand?: string;
```
